name: Pepperoni Calzones
description: This better-for-you recipe uses veggie pepperoni, greatly reducing fat content. Your family won’t even notice!
preparation: Roll out Pizza Dough and cut into 8 flat portions. Top half of each portion with Marinara Sauce, veggie pepperoni, vegetables and mozzarella.
Fold over other half of each portion and form a seal around the outside, forming a half-moon shape. Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner and bake for 20-25 minutes and serve.
tips: Make extra and freeze for easy lunches.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with a veggie platter and prepared Epicure’s Dip.
